Plus, teachers can easily assign films to students outside the classroom through any Learning Management System.

name: DorsaVi Video AI
tagline: Rapidly assess movement and muscle activity anywhere, anytime.
content: dorsaVi Video AI will bring you the ability to analyse a wide range of movements with instant results and completely sensorless. Offering running gait analysis, upper and lower limb movements, this tool will revolutionize how you approach fitness, assessments, and rehabilitation. Whether you’re working in a gym, a clinic or sporting club, this AI technology allows you to check movement patterns anywhere, delivering instant insights that will transform your business. Requires iPad Gen 10+
